price: (135) Say, "Each [of us] is waiting;[870] so wait. For you will know who are the companions of the sound path and who is guided."
arabic: قُلۡ كُلّٞ مُّتَرَبِّصٞ فَتَرَبَّصُواْۖ فَسَتَعۡلَمُونَ مَنۡ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلصِّرَٰطِ ٱلسَّوِيِّ وَمَنِ ٱهۡتَدَىٰ
footnotes: [870]- For the outcome of this matter.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qul kullun mutarabbiṣun fatarabbaṣū fasataʿlamūna man aṣḥābu al-ṣirāṭi al-sawiyi wamani ih'tadā
